item.description:
An amazing way to begin our journey through 2011, Herb is hosting a special event with reflections and several ceremonies. There will also be plenty of time to socialize. Here is a description of the event from Herb:

“This evening has been presented for over 25 years. There's plenty of time to reflect and share (as an option) about what happened to you in 2010 and what you learned this year and to focus on directions and goals for 2011. There's several ceremonies and candlelight. It's a special experience.”

The suggested minimum cost of attending the workshop is $15.00. A sliding scale of any amount is allowed if the cost would otherwise prevent you from coming. The traditional cost of this workshop has been $40.00 so if you can afford more than $15.00, it helps the presenter and those who pay less.

Refreshments will be served. We are also welcomed to bring or share our own food as long as it is vegetarian.
item.name: New Year’s Day Ceremony
